price: Àwọn tó mú àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn kan lẹ́yìn Rẹ̀, Allāhu sì ni Aláàbò lórí wọn. Ìwọ sì kọ́ ni olùṣọ́ lórí wọn.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa al-lahu ḥafīẓun ʿalayhim wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
